parameters: "ONCE I'M DONE WITH THIS REMATCH, I'LL BE ONE STEP CLOSER TO MY DREAM!"
"I, THE GREAT PAPYRUS, WILL FINALLY BECOME A ROYAL GUARDSMAN!"
"ITS ONLY A MATTER OF TIME, REALLY!"

"I HAVE THE SKILLS, THE CHARISMA...
AND A COOL OUTFIT!"
"THE ROYAL GUARD WON'T BE ABLE TO IGNORE MY GREATNESS ANY LONGER!"

"'PAPYRUS HAS EVERYTHING 
WE NEED IN A GUARDSMAN...
AND MORE!"

"THEY MIGHT EVEN THROW
A CELEBRATION IN MY HONOR!"

"A PARADE WITH FLOATS! FIREWORKS!
AND GIANT BALLOONS OF ME!"

"THEY WILL ALL FINALLY HAVE
A REASON TO CALL ME 'THE GREAT PAPYRUS!'"
"I WILL TELL SO MANY GREAT STORIES OF MY HEROIC ACTS!!"
"LIKE THE ONE WHERE I BEST YOU IN A REMATCH!"

"* YOU WON!" + NewLine() +
"You earned 0 XP and 0 gold."
round((singleplayerStats.weaponATK + singleplayerStats.ATK - singleplayerStats.DEF + damageAmassed.randomDecimal) * (1 - TargetBar.Distance(CenterCheck )/ Target.Width()) * 2)
"* " + enemyName + " - ATK " + enemyStats.ATK + " DEF " + enemyStats.DEF + NewLine() + "* " + enemyStats.checkDesc
"* " + enemyName + " stares directly at your SOUL."

"* Papyrus is trying to think 
of a way to catch you off-guard."

hudSelection.currentMenu + " " + hudSelection.currentSelection + " " + hudSelection.page + NewLine() + "amassed atk: " + damageAmassed.totalValue + NewLine() + "bar distance calculated: " + damageAmassed.barDistance  + NewLine() + "random decimal: " + damageAmassed.randomDecimal + NewLine() + "Monster HP: " + enemyStats.HP + NewLine() + hudSelection.attackOngoing + NewLine() + "Dialogue Value: " + dialogueValue + NewLine() + "DialogueOngoing: " + hudSelection.dialogueOngoing + NewLine() + "AttackOngoing: " + hudSelection.attackOngoing
